name: Dice Go: Yatzy
description:
Dice Go is the classic dice-rolling challenge where you’ll shake, score and shout! Can you roll the right combinations to beat the competition? It is the game with a unique combination of luck and strategy. Every game is an exciting challenge to rack up the highest score.

Keep your brain active and sharp, analyze all the possibilities and try to get the best score to win over your opponent!

It is played with 5 dice. Each player's turn consists of rolling the dice up to 3 times in hope of making 1 of 13 combinations. Each combination has to be done once and only once. The objective is to achieve the highest score possible at the end of the game.

Dice Go has amazing features like:

- Practice mode
- Bots for offline play
- Super crisp graphics and sounds effects
- The best version of the classic dice game!
- Totally free, even no in-app purchases.

And more features and game modes to come in our next updates!
